title: Porca Puttana Troia Vaffanculo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Once per game, Porca Puttana Troia Vaffanculo and pick a target, immediately killing (bypassing values) that target, all their visitors, the player visited by your target, and everyone that visits you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill less than half of the players in the game while having used your ability.

desc:
Post 2502
*Ma Vai A Morire Brutto Figlio di Zocc--*
